title: Murrayville Consolidated School
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and E.J. Perry
brief_description: Documentary about a co-educational school in Murrayville, Victoria which began as a single room class in 1914 to a consolidated school by 1946. Children from about a dozen areas including Manya North, Kadoon, Gunamalary, Ngallo Sunset etc were picked up by bus from their rural homes.
